author: Staff Reporter
text:
District Collector V. Sampath has said that employing manual scavengers to clean human excreta is punishable under law.A meeting to discuss measures to prevent employing manual scavengers for cleaning sewage tanks, and human excreta was held at the Collectorate.

He said that Section 7 and 8 of Prohibition of Employment as Manual Scavengers and Their Rehabilitation Act, 2013 prevents any person from employing, either directly or indirectly, any workers for hazardous cleaning of a sewer of a septic tank.

The Collector asked citizens to inform the government officials when they come across employment of such persons in buildings or industries so that action could be taken against them.

The local authority should create awareness campaigns.
title: Manual scavenging will not be allowed
